Course Module Data Visualisation

These visualisations are based on data generated due to interaction with course module section of the platform. They are mainly based on two metrics for each module- total number of students accessed and average percentage of activities completed.
  • average percentage of activities visited in a module - telangana
  • total number of students accessed courses - telangana
  • average percentage of activities visited in a module - rajasthan
  • total number of students accessed courses - rajasthan
  • average percentage of activities visited in a module - mizoram
  • total number of students accessed courses - mizoram
  • average percentage of activities visited in a module - chhattisgarh
  • total number of students accessed courses - chhattisgarh
  • average percentage of activities visited in a module - all states
  • total number of students accessed courses - all States
